Content.Text:
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>? Why are you standing there in the
doorway?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I see. They do look like they are enjoying
themselves, yes.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrm? <MYNAME>?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oi! <MYNAME>, what's wrong?!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You noticed the moment <MYNAME> arrived,
didn't you?
<PAGE>
Yet you still pretended not to. I see you are still
as mischievous as always.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho ho! I simply thought those two could stand
to grow a little closer together, is all.
<PAGE>
This was a wonderful opportunity to prod them
along.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Very true. And besides, if this is enough to ruin
their relationship, then it wasn't going anywhere
in the first place.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>My, my! And who was the one chiding me for
what I had done?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>I'm afraid I have no idea what you are talking
about.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_L><FONT_SIZE_L><MYNAME>!!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Idiot!! What did you think you were doing,
jumping out in front of a moving cart?! You
could have been hurt!
Oh my gosh, are you all right?!

No, no. I'm sorry I didn't see you sooner. I'm very
glad you're all right.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Why did you run away like that?
Say what's on your mind.
Say nothing.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Ahh, now I see. So that's what it was.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But no matter who looks like a better match for
me, that is something you shouldn't truly need
to worry about.
<PAGE>
I don't care who thinks whom would be a
perfect match for me. The only one I truly love is
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Or...do you truly doubt my feelings for you?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You are nervous that I seem too
comfortable around others?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm. Do you think I would chase headlong
after you or yell out to you in desperation, as I
did, if that were the case?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I am not nearly so mature, nor so secure as you
seem to think I am.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I may look it to you, but on the inside I am
anything but.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
To be frank, you are so friendly and popular that
I have to wonder if you truly want to be with an
old man like myself.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But like I said earlier, there's little point in
worrying over that.
<PAGE>
There is nothing we can do to shrink the gap in
our ages. And no matter what that gap is, I still
want to be with you.
<PAGE>
So instead of worrying over who "looks like" a
better match for whom, I trust you when you
say that you love me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Perhaps part of the reason I look so comfortable
is because that is the way I have been thinking
about it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What about you, <MYNAME>? Could you not
think of it that way, too?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, good.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well then, let us promise ourselves that we will
each do our best not to worry about those sorts
of things.
<PAGE>
But if it does get to be too much, neither of us
should hold it inside. We should open up to
each other and discuss it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you ever grow unsure of my feelings, say so. I
will tell you as many times as you wish to hear
it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you more than anyone else, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good. *phew* All this talking has made me
quite thirsty.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, do you have a bit of free time? If
so, why don't we go to my house and enjoy a
cup of coffee?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Let us dispense with the beating around the
bush. We've just opened ourselves up to one
another.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Now I wish to spend more time with you. Am I
the only one who wishes that?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
All right. If you would rather not speak of it, I
will not press the issue. ...I'm sorry.

I did eventually talk to him and we made up, but
that I couldn't open up to him right away hurt
him really badly.
<PAGE>
Next time, I shouldn't hold it all inside. I should
trust him more and tell him how I feel.
